welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Berchem, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. Explore and enjoy all that Berchem has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per day per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for some low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Brussels Airport, dedicated to handling all non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration using a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
